title: FPS drops during new patch 4.20
body:
Here i am, its season 4, on the old map. I check my FPS, 60 (what i cap it at). There is no change whatsoever in my frame rate, stable as anything. 
Flash forward to patch 4.20 new map etc etc. Get on start playing, goes well. about 15m in i start getting destroyed by FPS drops i cant even. Every 3 seconds im frozen for 1.5 seconds. Rito plz{{champion:268}}
